title: How to Make a Very Easy Balloon Sword

steps.title: Blow up the balloon using a balloon pump
steps.content: Blow up the balloon using a balloon pump . Blow until the tip just about disappears. Do not over-inflate. Each twist takes up space, so it can pop if you over-inflate.

steps.title: Fold the balloon as shown in the picture.
steps.content: Fold the balloon as shown in the picture.

steps.title: Grab the balloon with your free hand right next to the hand holding the balloon.
steps.content: Grab the balloon with your free hand right next to the hand holding the balloon. Fearlessly twist the two sections together. A double twist is standard. The loop you make should be large enough to fit the balloon through.

steps.title: Push the tip of the balloon through the loop.
steps.content: Push the tip of the balloon through the loop.

steps.title: Drag your hand over the sword, using the heat of your hand to pull the balloon straight.
steps.content: Drag your hand over the sword, using the heat of your hand to pull the balloon straight. It's now ready for a balloon sword fight!
